snippet: Ichibantei, in the East Village, can satisfy not just those who crave Japanese home cooking but those who crave it very late at night.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Ichibantei, Japanese restaurant in Manhattan's East Village that serves food until 3 am.
lead_paragraph: Ichibantei, in the East Village, can satisfy not just those who crave Japanese home cooking but those who crave it very late at night.

headline.print_headline: It’s 2 A.M. and You Need Tonkatsu
headline.seo: In the East Village at Ichibantei, Late-Night Japanese Food
headline.main: It’s 2 A.M. and You Need Tonkatsu
